name: Devil Descent
description:
Description

Devil Descent is an arcade game where your goal is to descend as far as you can into Hell without hitting any spikes and collecting coins on the way. If you're feeling completive, the game features an online leaderboard where you can compete against real life players and see who can descend the furthest!

How far can you descend into Hell?

Controls
  • Left mouse button - menu interaction / swap sides
  • ESC - pause / unpause
Credits
  • Art by David Harrington
  • Music by E1344RaiGamma
  • Sounds made with BFXR
